author: Vernon Cooper
message: These days people seek knowledge, not wisdom. Knowledge is of the past, wisdom is of the future.
title: Thought of the day

author: Benjamin Disraeli
message: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dalai Lama
message: People take different roads seeking fulfilment and happiness. Just because theyre not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
title: Thought of the day

author: Carl Jung
message: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
title: Thought of the day
